description: Pod-level kernel metrics collected by kpod-metrics via eBPF

targets.expr: sum by (pod) (kpod_disk_io_latency_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod) (kpod_disk_io_latency_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (kpod_irq_hw_latency_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod) (kpod_irq_hw_latency_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})
sum by (pod) (kpod_irq_sw_latency_sum{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}) / sum by (pod) (kpod_irq_sw_latency_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})

title: kpod-metrics
